# header-component

## Properties

| Property                | Attribute                 | Description                                                                         | Type                            | Default     |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `accountContainer`      | `account-container`       | If true, the account container will get shown.                                      | `boolean`                       | `true`      |
| `accountContainerTheme` | `account-container-theme` | The color appearance of the account container.                                      | `"blue" \| "dark" \| "white"`   | `"white"`   |
| `accountLabel`          | `account-label`           | The account label of the component.                                                 | `string`                        | `undefined` |
| `headerLogo`            | `header-logo`             | The logo of the component.                                                          | `string`                        | `undefined` |
| `headerLogoDash`        | `header-logo-dash`        | If true, the right border of the logo will get shown.                               | `boolean`                       | `false`     |
| `headerLogoDashTheme`   | `header-logo-dash-theme`  | The color of the right border of the logo.                                          | `"blue" \| "white"`             | `"white"`   |
| `headerLogoStretched`   | `header-logo-stretched`   | If true, the right border of the logo will be equal to the height of the component. | `boolean`                       | `false`     |
| `headerLogoTheme`       | `header-logo-theme`       | The theme of the logo of the component.                                             | `"blue" \| "dark" \| "white"`   | `undefined` |
| `navInlinePosition`     | `nav-inline-position`     | The position of the navigation.                                                     | `"left" \| "right"`             | `undefined` |
| `navLocation`           | `nav-location`            | The location of the navigation.                                                     | `"below" \| "inline" \| "none"` | `undefined` |
| `navSeparator`          | `nav-separator`           | If true, the component will get separated by an element.                            | `boolean`                       | `false`     |
| `navSeparatorTheme`     | `nav-separator-theme`     | The color of the separator that separates the component.                            | `"blue" \| "white"`             | `"white"`   |
| `navTheme`              | `nav-theme`               | The theme of the navigation.                                                        | `"blue" \| "dark" \| "white"`   | `undefined` |
| `searchTextTheme`       | `search-text-theme`       | The color of the search box.                                                        | `"blue" \| "dark" \| "white"`   | `undefined` |
| `searchTheme`           | `search-theme`            | The color appearance of the search box.                                             | `"blue" \| "dark" \| "white"`   | `undefined` |
| `showSearch`            | `show-search`             | If true, the search box will get shown.                                             | `boolean`                       | `undefined` |
| `size`                  | `size`                    | The size of the component.                                                          | `"normal" \| "slim"`            | `"normal"`  |
| `theme`                 | `theme`                   | The theme of the component.                                                         | `"blue" \| "dark" \| "white"`   | `undefined` |
